rubric_based_tool_use_quality_v1.rubric: The agent should: 1) Generate an initial story based on the topic, 2) Run critique/revision loop when needed, 3) Check grammar, 4) Analyze tone, 5) Regenerate if tone is negative

rubric_based_final_response_quality_v1.rubric: The story should be: coherent, creative, on-topic, grammatically correct, and have appropriate tone
